website_summaries.verdict: A bargain-priced hybrid mattress that balances its soft cushioning with underlying support.
pros: This mattress has a plush memory foam top that conforms to the body, helping relieve pressure points
Good temperature control - neither too hot nor too cold
Easy to unpack and set up
cons: Not supportive enough for those with back pain

website_summaries.verdict: While initially comfortable for hot sleepers, this mattress will compress quickly with regular use.
pros: Features a hybrid design with innerspring coils for support and memory foam for cushioning
Gel-infused top layer improves airflow to keep sleepers cool
Expands quickly once unboxed and has little to no chemical smell
cons: Mattress may compress within a year causing discomfort

website_summaries.verdict: A hybrid mattress that supports the sleeper while cushioning the hips, back, and shoulders.
pros: Features a thick layer of memory foam quilted into the top cover to conform to the body’s curves
Good support for the lower back, and it helps those with hip pain sleep more comfortably, even on their side
cons: May be too firm for lightweight sleepers

website_summaries.verdict: A good-quality mattress that is not too firm and not too soft, making it great for regular use or as a guest bed.
pros: Its combination of memory foam and innersprings offers a medium to medium-firm experience
Particularly good support for shoulders and back
Easy for sleepers to shift their position
cons: Not firm enough for back sleepers who require lots of support

customer_reviews.title: Mind blown= very happy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love getting a mattress in the mail and being able to unpack it, carry it up a flight of stairs, and set it up myself. (I possibly am tougher than the average gal LOL). So far it has been gloriously comfortable and I am very happy with this purchase. I was having a lot of back pain as well as hip and shoulder pain which has all dissipated.
customer_reviews.author: Julez

customer_reviews.title: A mattress with a side of BED BUGS
customer_reviews.text: I have been absolutely disgusted with this purchase. When I got the product they said small black particles were normal and nothing to worry about. I call BS! Those small black particles were BED BUGS! I have been working on getting rid of them since we got this mattress! We are a very clean household and this has disgusted me. From the pattern shown, the exterminator also believes it came from the mattress. Once we got rid of the mattress and all associates bedding we finally got a handle on it. That was an $1800 lesson learned over a $300 mattress. We replaced this with our previous mattress and have been bug free since. Never again!
customer_reviews.author: julie s.

customer_reviews.title: No bugs. Great mattress for the price
customer_reviews.text: We use this bed on the floor(for now) for our toddler. It’s very comfy when we lay to snuggle with him. It was cool to see it expand out of the box too! I was hesitant to order due to some reviews of bed bugs but this thing arrived pressed and wrapped in plastic-bug free!
customer_reviews.author: cjules182

customer_reviews.title: Don't trust all of the high reviews on this mattress!
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend buying this mattress. I based my purchase on the reviews, but either I got a dud or the reviews are not totally accurate. I had an indention in the middle of my mattress where I slept after the first night. I tried to get a memory foam topper and that helped a little, except that I still have a seemingly permanent dent in the mattress. This didn't help my back problem at all. FYI: I am 5ft 2in and weigh 135. Also, it's so loud when you move around. Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Carter

customer_reviews.title: Supportive in just the right spots while still feels like sleeping on a cloud.
customer_reviews.text: Overall very pleased with my new mattress. It does not get over hot as some have suggested. It also does provide a little bit of support along the sides of bed if I need to sit for just a moment or two. The coils are evident if I need to shift in the middle of the night. Otherwise, it is a sleep that allows me to awaken refreshed and ready for the day. I gave it 4 stars because the instructions to inbox the bed were nowhere to be found until after I unpacked the mattress and the directions were inside and only accessible after you opened mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Brian W. Kittrell

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this matress for my daughters room. The price was so great I half expected to need to buy a topper of some sort to put with it in order for it to be comfortable for my 8 year old. It unpackaged quickly and was ready to sleep on during the first night. There was no strange smell that usually accompanies something plastic wrapped compressed. It unrolled and fluffed right up. I purchased a second one for my son when he needed a new one. And we have had this one for about 5 months already and I am still very happy and haven't had to purchased any toppers for either. Very pleased and I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: DeAnna M.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, not too squishy
customer_reviews.text: I don’t have a lot of experience with different mattresses, but I really like it. I didn’t want to go full memory foam, so this was a great compromise. Also, there are no bugs. That’s just ridiculous
customer_reviews.author: Ezra

customer_reviews.title: Sides Push Down
customer_reviews.text: Back in the day, mattresses had delicate edges. We were forbidden to sit on the edge of beds for fear of "breaking down" the mattress and making it slope. Well, this mattress comes new with sloping sides due to the top part ("double top") anyway, and sitting on the bed made this so much worse. I felt like I was slipping off unless I was in the middle of the bed. I ordered a different brand for myself and relegated this mattress to the guest room. Let the guests slide onto the floor. That'll keep 'em from overstaying their welcome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not 10"
customer_reviews.text: This mattress has been resting for over 24 hours now. I don't believe it will recover, but if it does I will update. They may be 10" at factory, but it seems the materials are not recovering after being compressed for 8-9 months. I opened the mattress 02/2020 and the mfg date is 05/2019. I would like to be refunded $70 as this is now an 8" model according to the illustrated detail photos on the website. These photos draw the measurement line to the top blue piping. I understand the pillow top adds another 3/4" thickness, but that is not included according to the sales photos. I can feel the very stiff coils. Not that great.
customer_reviews.author: W. Blackwell

customer_reviews.title: No Free Bedbugs
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought the twin 8 inch for my office/guest bedroom and was disappointed that I did not get the free bed bugs everyone is complaining about. So I ordered the queen size 10 inch mattress for my bed. Sad to say I still did not get the free bed bugs. However, both times I got a fantastic mattresses for the price point and am happy with my purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Genesee

customer_reviews.title: Our second one purchased in the last few months replacing all
customer_reviews.text: These are the best mattresses we have found in years after spending thousands on sealy/simmons and other crappy scams. Bought a queen and the a full and plan to replace all of the kids mattresses with these. It is actually a hybrid, there are springs on the bottom half and foam on the top half, absolutely amazing. open the plastic wrap and the mattress springs to life, probably takes a day to fully expand but you can sleep on it right when you open it. Truly the best most comfortable mattresses we have purchased in 30 years, with a pretty bug family. As for the price, compared to the big name crap these are a dime on the dollar.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Burke

customer_reviews.title: Great bed!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love!!! For someone like me with back problem this is perfect for me not to hard not to soft. It’s definitely as I expected.when it came rolled up in a box I was a little skeptical but as I got it out and put it to use I couldn’t be happier. I am about 2 weeks in and honestly sleeping better than I have in a long time .
customer_reviews.author: Jamielee Adams

customer_reviews.title: Good value mattress
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mattress for the guest bedroom and have slept on it for a week to test it out. Overall, it is comfortable but I would not call it a great mattress. This is an exceptional mattress *for the price*. The springs squeak and it provides good enough (but not great) support. Overall, if you are looking for a good, cheap mattress - this is it! If you are looking for genuine comfort - keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Priced right and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these mattresses a little over a year ago they were twin sized and they were 8 inch thick for my toddlers I thought they were wonderful so when I needed a new mattress I went to them and bought a 10 inch clean for my 16 1/2-year-old daughter these are very comfortable so I’m a repeat purchaser and will Be purchasing more of these as I need to replace other mattresses in our household
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great value and NO BED BUGS
customer_reviews.text: This was the first mattress I've ever ordered online and I'm very happy with the quality despite it being so cheap. I ordered the 10 inch queen size mattress and it was very easy to take out of the box and set up. I read the reviews that some people can feel the springs, but I haven't felt anything but the memory foam! The mattress had NO BED BUGS either. I saw the specks of plastic that's described online but they were not bugs of any kind. I got a bed bug mattress protecter just in case though. So far, very satisfied with this mattress and I would definitely recommend this for others who are on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: MY QUEEN SIZE HAD A BED BUG
customer_reviews.text: AFTER EXAMINING THE THE BED FULLY ANS NOT SEEING ANY INSECT ON IT I CUT OPEN THE PLASTIC AND THEN ONE LARGE BUG THAT WAS HIDDED INSIDE THE MATTRESS CAME OUT! SORRY THAT THE PIC IS BLURRY I FREAKED OUT AND TOSSED THIS MATTRESS OUTSIDE!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Agonizing
customer_reviews.text: After having spinal surgery in 2006, I require firm and reliable bedding. I read the reviews and hopefully purchased this bed with the hopes it would be a good fit for my back! I am so upset, I have tried it for a few weeks now and every morning I am waking up with agonizing back pain. I do not know what is going on and I feel duped. Extremely disappointed with the quality and the advertising of this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and flimsy
customer_reviews.text: The reviews on this mattress are all over the place. Something or someone is behind many of them is my guess. Fact is this mattress is HORRIBLE. Think mattress you get with a cheap sleeper sofa. It’s soft, unstructured and feels incredible cheap. Plus it came with a nice tear on the bottom. So we got a full refund. Buying another Lucid.
customer_reviews.author: G.A. F.

customer_reviews.title: This mattress was handcrafted by angels
customer_reviews.text: This bed is absolutely amazing. It’s exactly what I wanted, which was right in the middle. It’s got the bounciness of a spring mattress, with a delicious memory foam pillow top. My only complaint is the odor upon opening. It was strong to me, but easily remedied with a fan pointed at it on high for a few hours. If you’re on the fence, do it. I looked through hundreds of mattresses on here, before I took the plunge. It’s worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Candice Farnham

customer_reviews.title: Incredible 10" mattress
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for a new wall bed we installed in our guest bedroom. After reading about mattresses, this seemed like it would work and it did. It easy installed, not too heavy so I can make the bed with ease but most of all extremely comfortable. It's well made. We liked it so much we decided to sleep on it ourselves. Great bed at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Susan V.

customer_reviews.title: Sweet dreams with a thousands of bugs
customer_reviews.text: I liked the item at the beginning. It's been four months so far, and I noticed little bugs touring around my apartment. I cleaned every inch of my apartment; I wasn't sure where they come from. I was still nicely sleeping on my matters. Awesome! I walked up to my room and packed my stuff to do my laundry. I decided to wash my sheet. Once I took out of the bed, I saw nidus between foam and mattress! From now on my beautiful dreams on Linenspa Hybrid Matress became a nightmare. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: NO BED BUGS
customer_reviews.text: Great bed for the price, extremely happy. Reading reviews I was nervous at the possibility of bed bugs but just to ease anyone thinking about getting this mattress.... It's literally impossible for bed bugs to be in this mattress, it comes vacuum sealed and bed bugs can't survive without oxygen. Just people making stuff up to probably get a free bed, don't believe them.
customer_reviews.author: Sonja Pugh

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this bed for almost a year before I decided to write a review. It still feels like new. Perfect medium support. Nice topper and strong springs. We had issues in the past where mattresses would sink in after a few months but it’s clear this one will be sticking around for a while, especially since we use a mattress protector. I love it. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: I never knew what back pain was until I bought this
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had this for even a year and have needed to rotate the mattress twice already. I'm a relatively small person and it has already developed sunken-in depressions like it's been slept on for 20 years. I wake up more tired than when I went to bed, and my actual spine hurts, not to mention all the muscles in my back. While the price was unbelievable at the time, I now understand you get what you pay for. Save yourself lost sleep and keep browsing!
customer_reviews.author: Old Iron

customer_reviews.title: I got caught up reading reviews.
customer_reviews.text: I almost didn’t buy this because of the confusing difference in all the reviews, but I am glad I did. I am around 115 lbs (because apparently that makes a difference) and I find it perfectly soft yet firm. I have spent thousands on old mattresses, so I definitely wish I would have gotten one of these sooner. The ultimate selling point for me was the easy monthly payments. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Impressive budget bed
customer_reviews.text: The 10 inch version is almost a perfect bed, I've seen concerns about durability, but with the sales you can snag these at deep yearly discounts. It comes with a 10 year warranty and the springs seem strong so far. The bed expanded quickly but didn't feel normal until about a week in. Edge support leaves a bit to be desired but that's pretty much every bed in a box. If you're a larger person, the 10" version is a must. No odors, no mold and no bugs. Just a clean vacuum sealed mattress. If you're sleeping in a sagging mattress, buy these until you can afford the bed you want. Or just keep buying these.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Barber

customer_reviews.title: Made for smaller folks than me
customer_reviews.text: This mattress was an amazing price and the reason for my lower rating is as much related to me as the mattress. It is definitely cooler than the foam mattresses and I liked the coil/foam combination in theory. However, it is super "bouncy" and it just does not provide enough support for heavier folk. It has a great return window - so long in fact, that once I decided to ditch it, I could have returned it but didn't even look. So only let my review dissuade you from trying this out if you are old, achy, and heavy like myself.
customer_reviews.author: echo21

customer_reviews.title: 10" gets thin on edges
customer_reviews.text: The 10" version is a bit flimsy. No support on edges. The 10" mattress will compress to 2" if you sit on the edge.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This is our second time ordering a Linenspa mattress and we’re extremely grateful for it. My husband and I are on the picky side (my husband more than me) when it comes to a comfortable mattress and these do the trick! It’s the perfect balance between firm and foam (soft, sinking in). We sleep so much better on these mattresses compared to others we’ve had. We don’t have any back problems, but my husband does have shoulder problems and the Linenspa mattresses always help with that pain while he’s trying to move around and sleep. If you’re trying to change up your mattress, I do highly recommend a Linenspa!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: My husband ordered this for us as a temporary bed in our temp leased apt; this will do until we get our real bed back from storage across the country. This was inexpensive, is a good height and fits 2 people okay. I would not call it a magical night of sleep but it far surpasses the floor, a sofa pull out bed or a blow up mattress. I think part of my issue is we typically use a box spring, a mattress and a mattress topper and therefor....my review might be unfair in that we are only using this item with a cheap bed frame from online and no topper.
customer_reviews.author: Natlward

customer_reviews.title: Would be perfect with a 1” foam topper
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a good mattress for the price, and perfect for people who “sleep hot.” The “medium” mattress feels more medium-firm to me. I put a 2” foam topper on it, which is a bit too soft. It would probably be perfect with a 1” foam topper, if you’re someone who likes a plush mattress feel with the benefit of combo support below.
customer_reviews.author: R. K. Brookes

customer_reviews.title: Seriously the Worst matress ever
customer_reviews.text: Worst matress I've ever laid on in my entire life. Worst than sleeping in a sleeping bag on the ground. This matress literally is so firm it squeezes you're rib cage from spring pressure. Causing Major circulation and breathing problems. Warning. Healthy person or someone with an ailment. Either way do not purchase this matress. It's a complete nightmare. You'll never sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Sleeps like a dream!
customer_reviews.text: Was A little worried about the reviews about bugs, but when I received it, it didn’t have anything concerning. Regardless, industrial vacuum seals deprive anything living in there of oxygen and not many things can live without oxygen including bed bugs and their eggs... so! Got it out of the bag and it was like a science experiment where I had a small thing that turned into a monster rapidly in my living room once air rushed back into it. Sleeps like a dream! Got the 10” and I am not disappointed. It’s slightly firm for the stomach sleepers but still cloudy enough for the back sleepers. Love this mattress
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great bed, great price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed about a year ago. The bed was delivered quickly and set up was nearly nothing. Within 12 hours we were able to sleep in the bed and it was fully inflated. As far as size goes, it’s fantastic my fiancé who’s 6’1 sleeps very comfortably without issue. As far as comfortably goes it’s fantastic for the price and great quality. I encourage you to buy this product if you’re in a pinch for a bed quickly, a spare room bed or even everyday use this is a winner especially at the price point.
customer_reviews.author: James Calo.

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and affordable, highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: So i made sure i looked up reviews, not just from amazon but else where. There are no bedbugs forst of all, the company stated that there would be little black pieces if cardboard, an unfortunate side efdect for a great deal. For the price the mattress is great. It is comfortable amd i live it i recommend it especially for people on a budget like me. It is.worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress for an even better price!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this mattress in a hurry, praying that it came clean and that it was comfortable as we have house guests who didn't want to continue sleeping on an air mattress. We didn't want to spend a fortune, so off to Amazon Prime we went. Boy, am I glad we purchased. We got the Queen 10inch and its perfect. It sprang up immediately and reached 10inch fully in roughly 45 minutes. The mattress was perfectly clean and new and surprisingly VERY comfortable. Our house guests were/are very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Dante

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable mattress and doesn't empty the wallet
customer_reviews.text: I have used this mattress for about a month. It is very comfortable, medium firm, easy to install and inexpensive. I have looked at similar mattresses at various stores (average price for a 10 inch memory foam spring hybrid mattress is $600 plus) before I decided to purchase this online. Never bought a mattress online before this. Overall, it was a good experience and I recommend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: Rish

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sleeper for the money
customer_reviews.text: Mattress was for a guest bed but when my daughter saw it and felt it she switched her regular mattress to the guest bed and is using this one. Very soft, yet has adequate joint support. And whoever said this item arrived with bed bugs is CRAZY. Glad we did not pay attention to those idiotic assertions.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Lamb

customer_reviews.title: No bedbugs!
customer_reviews.text: I wanna start first by saying I haven't slept in it yet as I just got it today, so I can't see anything about good about the mattress just yet. But I can say there are no bedbugs. There are smell specks of cardboard etc inside that just come from the factory that might look like a bug, but there are none. Just smell specks of packing material. It comes from a factory vacuum sealed...impossible to have bedbugs.
customer_reviews.author: Noah

customer_reviews.title: My neck, my back, gotta figure out how to repack..
customer_reviews.text: I've been having back pain since I got this mattress. I bought a memory foam topper for it and it still isn't comfortable. Now I have to figure out how to wrap it so I can return it.
customer_reviews.author: Jtronix

customer_reviews.title: This mattress is rad!
customer_reviews.text: Im shocked at how nice of a mattress can just be shipped in a box in under a week and still cost such a small price.. are you using some kind of voodoo? We got the 10 inch and its so comfortable and had no strange manufacturing smell that needed to air out (I was worried it would) Im winning at life today because of this purchase.. get it!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Brookins

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with the comfort and support
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised it arrived in a box (it was compressed) even though it was a hybrid mattress with springs as well as gel memory foam on top. It's quite bouncy and has good support compared to my previous mattress which was entirely memory foam and I would sink into it a bit too much. As soon as I opened the plastic and let the air in, the mattress expanded very quickly. I've been sleeping on it for several nights now and I am very pleased with the level of comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too firm for me
customer_reviews.text: If you prefer a softer mattress, this is not the mattress for you. I cheaped out and bought this one instead of the plusher version and I wish I had been willing to spend a little more. However, this is a great mattress for the price. It arrived on time, the box was quite heavy but I wrestled it into my room by myself. Be careful opening the plastic wrapping, it pops open aggressively. The mattress fully expanded in about 24 hours. After discovering it was too firm for my liking, I added a memory foam topper and have been sleeping comfortably on it. No signs of bed bugs
customer_reviews.author: Katy Roscoe

customer_reviews.title: Firm but soft, good quality, great support!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this mattress! I bought it based off of the high ratings and was skeptical. Some review spoke of bed bug but I honestly feel there is corruption behind those reviews. It is a wonderful quality mattress with a super soft feel to it without sheets. It's also very attractive and extremely comfortable, soft but firm. I can't stand a mattress you sink into and this one allows you to be on a firm mattress without feeling like you are sleeping on the floor. I definitely highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: it sank low and you ll get bugs!!!! do not buy
customer_reviews.text: after buying this, immediately my husband sank low in the bed. we thought we need to eait a few days until the shape fully where it should be but no. when he sink, i sink as welll. it’s 217 lbs. & 6’3ft so i dont think he should sink like this. he didnt think we could return this mattress and now we stuck wwirh this mattress thats killing his back and mine. i been getting bites on this mattress and after reading reviews my god! the marks are like the one on here!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress, fun unpacking.
customer_reviews.text: First time I ever bought a mattress instead of getting a hand-me-down. It’s much squishier than my last mattress. I got the 10inch mattress and if I plopped down too hard, I’d probably hit the slats underneath (I weigh 170lbs.) Overall, I have no complaints, I just need to get use to this new feel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than a regular queen. More like a full.
customer_reviews.text: Why are there such good reviews? I keep waking up multiple times on this mattress, not sure why. It's just not comfortable. Also, this says it's a queen but it's definitely way smaller than a queen. I'm trying to return but it came packaged super tight. Whole experience is very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Meechelios

customer_reviews.title: Gives me horrible back pain.
customer_reviews.text: It feels comfortable at first, especially after a long day. However, every morning since I got this mattress I wake up with excruciating low back pain. I’m a 24 year old perfectly healthy female. The pain actually wakes me up in the middle of the night and then it’s a constant struggle to get more sleep. I’m desperate need of a new mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Cianci

customer_reviews.title: Great if you don't want a rock for a mattress
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for the guest bedroom. One guest who doesn't like a hard mattress loved it and said she slept well. Her husband has back pain and prefers a hard mattress. He said his back hurt. I don't like a hard mattress at all and this is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Veonn E.

customer_reviews.title: Firm yet comfortable
customer_reviews.text: So I bought the 10inch memory foam mattress and I'm very happy with this. I prefer a firm, yet slightly soft bed and this hits the right note. The quality of the mattress is great. I read reviews that mentioned it had bed bugs or other quality issues but I did not have any quality issues with my mattress. The mattress comes in an airtight bad, double wrapped. It's extremely heavy due to the condensed packaging. But I've had my mattress over a week now and I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: meow.mix

customer_reviews.title: Softer than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Very soft , not sturdy at all. I was thinking it could stay for at least 2-3 years. But thinking this one might not hang that longer. I am really concerned about this. It was for my guest room / additional room.. some parts of the mattress is already deeper than most other parts. Hesitant to return now as it would be pain in everywhere..
customer_reviews.author: Van G

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'6", 140 lbs and a side sleeper. My previous mattress was 10 years old and in dire need of replacement so I purchased this product in hopes it would help me sleep better. Unfortunately, even after 2 weeks of sleeping on it, I still can't get comfortable on the mattress. Shoulder and lower back pain every morning, tossing and turning to find a comfortable position all night, and I just get too much pressure on my side (shoulder and hip). Amazon was great in helping me return the product, but I definitely wouldn't recommend this to a side sleeper. On my back felt good but I'm not a back sleeper so I couldn't fall asleep.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 3 day shipping during covid19
customer_reviews.text: With my ICU RN wife, I thot I could couch sleep for a month. Nope. Two nights and I ordered the mattress. Shipping said 7 days. It arrived in 3 days. I teared. Not that kind of guy but I did. Laid it out in front of the living room big screen tv. Tytytyty
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am not very happy with my purchase, I opened the package and left it for 3 full days before using it, but it is not inflated evenly, the middle part of the mattress is higher than the sides and it really its such a large item that I would be a nuisance to return, total waste of my money, I think I should have bought it in a physical place where I could test the quality. Don’t buy it, at least not this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quite a disappointment. Sinks.
customer_reviews.text: This mattress was super comfortable for around 1 week. Now we already notice "sinking" on each side of the bed and, we are of average weight. For 249.00 I wouldn't expect to start sliding off the side so soon. Quite a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Jo B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect condition
customer_reviews.text: Posting this just to say - fresh out of the box, plastic still partially on, and no bed bugs.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni B

customer_reviews.title: Obscenely good comfort and value Mattress
customer_reviews.text: Obscenely good comfort and value. I purchased one for my guest room and then purchased another for the master room.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I didn’t know how to feel about purchasing a bed from Amazon. I was a little bit skeptical at first but after reading with so many good reviews I had to try it out for myself. I’ve been sleeping on my mattress for about a month now and I can truly say this mattress is one of the most comfortable mattress I have ever purchased I am honestly getting the best sleep that I have gotten in years!! Wish I would’ve bought this mattress sooner. I LOVE IT 😍
customer_reviews.author: Luxe👑

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort and price with no bugs...
customer_reviews.text: I am a believer. Very comfortable mattress for a great price. Even my adult daughter commented on it after staying over. We purchased this for grand kids to stay on for sleepovers and our daughter fell asleep on it while trying to get little ones to sleep. No bugs btw! I don’t know how that would get started in a factory so I think some people are blowing smoke a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Chris R

customer_reviews.title: Dog better not eat this bed...
customer_reviews.text: Needed an inexpensive bed and QUICK because our puppy chewed up our sleep number bed, and honestly I am more fond of this linenspa vs my sleep number! I purchased the medium, my husband wanted soft and I wanted firm so we met in the middle and were both extremely happy! Will purchase from this company for any other mattress needs!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy to move by myself.
customer_reviews.text: Have to be returned. My room is too small but not a lot of legroom, or room to maneuver this heavy heavy object. Besides that it takes two to three days to inflate empty gas. I did not have that kind of time, or the luxury of sleeping elsewhere till that. So I returned it. It may work for you. But it did not work for me.
customer_reviews.author: THE UP TOWN KID

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t really poof back up
customer_reviews.text: We were sceptical on buying a mattress online, we had previously purchased on from camping world in our old camper. This one seems to be printing our bodies and staying, I can’t roll into a new spot and so I toss and turn. Comfy at first, then it “deflates” I weigh 265 and my wife weighs about 165 Not a fan, but better than a factory mattress
customer_reviews.author: Travis Wadley

customer_reviews.title: Amazed and ready to order for every bed in the house!
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow! The last mattress I ordered on Amazon was horrendous. So I was a little hesitant on ordering another but based off these reviews, I decided to take a chance. Boy am I glad I did! This mattress is so comfy and well made! It’s the absolute best for sleep or relaxing and listening to some Taylor Swift! You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: KNICOLE

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Mattress
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have had this for a year and it's been our favorite mattress, despite it being cheaper than many other ones we've had. We loved it so much we got a second one for our guest room. It walks the perfect line between firm and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Samid penn

customer_reviews.title: Watch out if returning
customer_reviews.text: The mattress itself was fine. We decided it wasn't for us though, and began the return process. After dropping off at a UPS store we were told it had to be vacuum sealed or boxed to be accepted. I'm pretty sure this information isn't made readily available, so just know what you're getting into if returning.
customer_reviews.author: David F.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, great price!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this! The compact shipping made it easier for me to maneuver the mattress into the house and get it set up all by myself. It is extremely comfortable and i seems to help my back, hip and sore joints that tend to ache laying on certain mattresses which makes me restless all night long, but not a problem with this matteress! I comfortably am able to sleep! Love it! Price was amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Brittane Miller

customer_reviews.title: Ordered a 10 inch, received 8 inch! WTF
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 10 inch and received an 8 inch instead. This is frustrating. Called Linenspa and they said they could do nothing so I called Amazon and they said the same. The box says "10 inch" on it, but after letting it settle, mattress has not expanded to its "10 inches" Mattress quality looks like; you get what you pay for. Spend little, expect not much in return.
customer_reviews.author: Kotarbinski

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price! Don't expect luxury!
customer_reviews.text: Decent build for the price point, and fairly comfortable. I am very hot natured. I was expecting to possibly overheat, like some memory foams tend to cause. But to my surprise, I didn't! Works every well on a platform bed without a box spring!
customer_reviews.author: R. Bradley

customer_reviews.title: SHOCKED BY THE GOOD REVIEWS...
customer_reviews.text: With so many great reviews, I expected SOOOO much better. To me, the mattress is very uncomfortable and there is a constant sound of the springs popping, even though I'm not a heavy person. I waited a while to review it so that I had a fair enough time to break it in... I even considered the possibility of bait and switch because I cannot imagine anyone giving this matress more than 2 stars...
customer_reviews.author: Bearbear

customer_reviews.title: great mattress
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for an year now, had no trouble until now. I chose this over Zinus as it was a bit cheaper. Great mattress!
customer_reviews.author: Piyush

customer_reviews.title: Buy this mattress
customer_reviews.text: I have not slept this well in 30 years and I am 29. I cannot wait to sleep in this bed every night, to the tune of my favorite song “pour some sugar on me” by Def Leppard. ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Linn

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not quite a tempurpedic but for this price, it's definitely a quality mattress. I bought this for my son and he loves it so much better than his old innerspring, pillow top mattress. Definitely a win.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Defective version
customer_reviews.text: Bought the twin for a guest day bed and loved it so when it was time for me to upgrade I got a queen 10 inch. Left it to inflate, slept on it a few weeks great. Noticed that one side was starting to have a dip and thought oh thTa the memory foam part sinking in it will pop back. Nope, it has a permanent dip. Switched to sleeping on the other side and it is fine, never developed the dip the other side got in two weeks. I've had for 6 weeks total and now I'm out a mattresd
customer_reviews.author: Blair20_01

customer_reviews.title: Do you want your life to be worse, be better, or stay the same?
customer_reviews.text: "Morning everyone!" Is not a phrase I'm used to saying. Getting out of bed used to be a physical and mental struggle, but after one night of stressful toilet repairs and a trip to the hospital, I came home to remember that my wife and I ordered this new mattress. I woke up this morning, wife awake, promptly at 8:00 a.m. with ZERO pain and ZERO desire to stay in bed. I am currently writing this review 2 miles into a 5k at the gym, with my whole day planned ahead. If this is the life you want, BUY THIS ONE.
customer_reviews.author: mherdt

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: We have tow of these queen beds and, after 6 months, I can report that wife and I are sleeping better than we did on our old expensive name-brand bed. We put a topper on it. However, in retrospect, it wasn't needed. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chizmo

customer_reviews.title: Bed is Nice but alot softer than firm
customer_reviews.text: The bed says that it will be firm but it is anything but that. I was expecting it to have a little bit of soft bounce but I almost sink into it when I sit. Definitely not what I was looking for but at least I get a good Nights sleep. For the price, its decent but I think there may be better ones out there. Do your research before you purchase this.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Van Olphen

customer_reviews.title: True comfort
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Able lay anyway i want and still feel comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: pilots

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: First night I was unable to sleep on it due to how stiff and unforgiving this was. I read a good portion of the reviews before I bought it. Maybe it’s just me but I couldn’t stand this bed. I will be going to a mattress store today to buy a new one because I can’t take another night with it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped functioning properly after a month.
customer_reviews.text: Have had it about 50 days. The first 30 days were good, but for the past two weeks I was suspicious that hole has been developing. It's official, it's there, back hurts pretty bad. Yes I've had it on a bed frame the whole time. No bed bugs though.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Had to return this product it was the worst mattress I've ever slept on
customer_reviews.text: Definitely an example of the reviews not matching the product. No idea how this happens. Regardless I purchased this product and allowed it to open per instructions. After waiting the amount of days (and then some) I could still feel the individual coils under the foam. In addition, you feel as if you're sliding off the sides. It was not comfortable to sleep on at all it almost felt like a glorified air mattress. As you may or may not know, returning a mattress you purchased in a box is not easy to say the least. Amazon did refund me, but this was without the question the worst mattress I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: MJD NYC

customer_reviews.title: Good, but doesn’t inflate to 10 inches
customer_reviews.text: Good bed for price, but it’s been 4 days and I haven’t laid in it “waiting” for it to inflate. It’s alittle over 8 inches now, definitely not 10 inches, as you can see in the picture. I ordered a twin with this brand before and didn’t have this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi

customer_reviews.title: Less than A year Back Pain has begun
customer_reviews.text: At first the product was OK. I slept well. About a month ago I started experiencing back pain. I could not flip the mattress over so I turned it around. For the past several nights the back pain has returned. I have just ordered a topper for it hoping not to have to trash this mattress in less than a year.
customer_reviews.author: willie42

customer_reviews.title: Great bed
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bed it's so much better than the one I had, the only downside is that it's squeaky.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Schoppert

customer_reviews.title: I’m in pain
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this mattress but you get what you pay for. I have sciatica pain issues and this mattress makes it worse.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa L.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mattress, no bed bugs
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace our run down mattress in our camper. I couldn’t be happier. It’s so comfortable and was very easy to set-up due to it being rolled into a box. No bed bugs or dirt either. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey J. Shoe

customer_reviews.title: Decent Bed, good price
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable! It’s not too firm, but not too soft. Personally, I’d be happier with a softer bed, but I’m not uncomfortable by any means. The price is right for a decent bed. Edges took longer to inflate than the rest of the bed.
customer_reviews.author: D. Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Might as well be sleeping on a rock
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is so unbelievably hard that it actually causes even more neck and shoulder pain because there is no relief from the pressure. I am at a loss because from the food reviews this mattress was made out to be amazing but even with a memory foam topper I haven’t had a good nights sleep in months. Even guzzling down melatonin won’t help. I wish there was a return policy or some way to rectify this situation because I am literally sleeping on the floor because that ends up being easier to fall asleep on then this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: More comfortable than what you'd expect
customer_reviews.text: This is a surprisingly comfortable mattress. We got it as an extra for our guest room. I slept on it and was pleasantly surprised, it's a semi firm mattress that offers good support. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson A. Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Mattress never fully opened had it less than a month and springs misshaped the mattress. Woke up with aches every night I had it. Sits in the garage as I search for a new mattress. Very dissapointed and returning it is nearly impossible.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Gioia

customer_reviews.title: Great bed for your money
customer_reviews.text: So, i built a loft bed to put this on, just beware that when opening initial it expends quite rapidly. Almost knocked me off. But bed has been very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Graves

customer_reviews.title: Not too shabby
customer_reviews.text: I initially put this over my slat system for my platform bed, but that was way too soft. Reinforced the platform and this mattress worked great for me. 10” is fairly firm which I wanted. It only expanded to about 9”, but the comfort has been great.
customer_reviews.author: Chris B

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable (once Finished expanding)
customer_reviews.text: I loved that this mattress came rolled up and air sealed straight to my door. It was quite the experience unpacking it! Day 3 sleeping on this mattress & it’s really comfortable. The first night I got up the next day with a slight lower back ache BUT that could’ve been due to us not allowing it to fully expand the full 48 hours before sleeping on it. 3 days Since then I’ve not had any problems. Would definitely recommend. I’m 5’2” / 145lbs & this bed works great on my slatted platform bed without a box spring.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Amazing mattress for a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time with no issues. Packaging was very easy to open and get the mattress out. I found it amusing though that the instructions to decompress were packed in pretty good that I didn't see it until the mattress unfolded. No complaints though, it was easy enough. Exactly as described and came in perfect condition. Very decent upgrade from an old twin mattress. It's the best mixture of firm and comfortable, I haven't slept better since I've upgraded to this mattress and better pillows. I used to wake up incredibly sore and was very prone to stiff necks, neither have been a problem in the few months I've had it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Linespan mattress
customer_reviews.text: A little dissapointed..mattress did not inflate to actual purchased size listed of 8". Followed directions for not usimg for 24 hours..but still reached its max.of 6 1/4". Would love to have 8".. Bryan Tyler service
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Tyler Service

customer_reviews.title: More mattress than I thought I'd get
customer_reviews.text: Mattress inflated to 10 inches. I tend to like a medium to firm mattress and this is very comfortable. I only slept on it 2 nights, but I had restful sleep. The mattress sides do not lend to sitting on your bed - you might slip off. The mattress is being used in a guest room, so I'm not sure how long it will perform, but so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Trixie

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and a good value
customer_reviews.text: I’m on my second one of these - got 1 a year ago in a temporary apartment situation and was really satisfied with the comfort for the price. I moved across country this month so rather than move it all that way, I just ordered a new one and have been on it for 2 weeks again now and am just as satisfied as the first.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Mattress did not fully inflate
customer_reviews.text: The mattress was delivered a day early, which was nice. Luckily my neighbor brought it in for me since I wasn’t home. It’s been about 3 weeks since I’ve had it and I have to say it’s very comfortable and I fall asleep quickly. My complaint is that one corner of the mattress never fully reinflated and so it’s a little lop-sided. Otherwise easy to set up, just carefully cut the wrapping and the mattress unfold.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth D.

customer_reviews.title: How is a mattress this good so affordable?
customer_reviews.text: I've been waiting to write this review to make sure I fully experienced this mattress but I've wanted to sing it's praises since the first day I opened the box. I replaced a cheap target college mattress with this and it's like I moved from a basement apartment to a penthouse. I've slept soundly every night for the last six months. My back doesn't hurt, my hips don't hurt, and i don't wake up. I feel no shifting, whether it be my partner or a large chocolate lab. Don't be fooled by this price tag, this is the best mattress. My roommate is getting one, my parents will be buying one for their guest rooms, BUY THIS MATTRESS.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Was fooled by the Amazon Choice rating on this product. Mattress never expanded to more than 8 inches. You roll off all of the edges so must sleep in the middle. Listed as medium but was incredibly firm and uncomfortable. Gave it two nights and no more.
customer_reviews.author: SDUB

customer_reviews.title: So irritating
customer_reviews.text: I’m stuck with this mattress at home UPS won’t pick it up even though they charged me $11 for pick up, every time they come they say oh we can’t because it’s big, This mattress is very uncomfortable my daughter hated it so I tried to take a nap and try it, it was too soft your body aches after sleeping on it. I will never buy from them again
customer_reviews.author: Nawal Skolnik

product_meta.title: Linenspa 10 Inch Memory Foam and Innerspring Hybrid Mattress - Medium Feel - Queen
product_meta.description: Size:Queen| Style Name:10 Inch Mattress OnlyNot too soft and not too firm, this mattress falls right into the sweet spot of perfectly comfortable for sleepers of all styles and preferences. A thick layer of memory foam is quilted into the cozy knit cover to provide a cocoon of comfort that will lull you to sleep. Memory foam conforms to your body to align the spine for comfort that leaves you rested and pain-free. Under another couple layers of foam, a base made up of 6 inches of high-quality springs provides the support you need. Order this medium-feel mattress and it will be shipped right to your door. Mattress comes compressed and rolled in a box for hassle-free delivery and setup; all you have to do is unroll it and enjoy the comfort of the LINENSPA 10 Inch Memory Foam Hybrid Mattress.
feature_bullets: 10 inch hybrid combines the traditional support of an innerspring mattress with the plush comfort of hypallergenic memory foam for a medium feel
A thick layer of memory foam conforms to your curves to help eliminate pressure points and increase comfort
Compressed and shipped in a box for convenient delivery and setup, this universally comfortable mattress makes relaxing easy
Available in a medium firm 8 inch profile, a medium 10 inch profile, or a plush 12 inch profile that also features gel infusions and individually encased coils
Packaging process may leave small brown flecks called carbons in the mattress packaging; These carbons are harmless pieces of plastic and will not stick to your mattress; 10 year limited warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars36,640 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
